FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle course that this meeting belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of description field

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum grade (points possible) for this activity. Negative value indicates a scale being used.

FIELD.NAME: created_at
FIELD.COMMENT: ISO datetime format

FIELD.NAME: host_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting host user ID. Can be any user under this account. Cannot be updated after creation.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting topic. Max of 300 characters.

FIELD.NAME: start_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting start time (Unix timestamp, seconds). For scheduled meeting only.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: recurring
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the meeting or webinar recurring?

FIELD.NAME: webinar
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this a webinar?

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting duration (seconds). For scheduled meeting only.

FIELD.NAME: timezone
FIELD.COMMENT: Timezone to format start_time, like "America/Los_Angeles". For scheduled meeting only.

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting password. Password may only contain the following characters: [a-zA-Z0-9@-_*]. Max of 10 characters

FIELD.NAME: option_jbh
FIELD.COMMENT: Join meeting before host start the meeting.

FIELD.NAME: option_start_type
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting start type. Can be "video" or "screen_share". (deprecated)

FIELD.NAME: option_host_video
FIELD.COMMENT: Start video when host joins meeting.

FIELD.NAME: option_participants_video
FIELD.COMMENT: Start video when participants join meeting.

FIELD.NAME: option_audio
FIELD.COMMENT: Meeting audio options. Can be "both", "telephony", "voip".

FIELD.NAME: exists_on_zoom
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the meeting can be found on Zoom servers. Usually should be true, should only be false if API call returned that meeting can't be found.

TABLE.NAME: zoom_meetings_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: A queue for the Cron to add meeting report info to zoom_meetings_participants table.

FIELD.NAME: meeting_webinar_instance_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The meeting UUID or webinar UUID per Zoom API.

FIELD.NAME: meeting_webinar_universal_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The meeting_id or webinar_id per Zoom API.

FIELD.NAME: end_time
FIELD.COMMENT: When the meeting ended/will end

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field exists only because Moodle requires us to have a unique 'id' field. Other than that it's useless.

KEY.NAME: id_primary
KEY.COMMENT: Moodle forces us to use id as a primary key. Most database actions will be performed using meeting_webinar_instance_id.

TABLE.NAME: zoom_meetings_participants
TABLE.COMMENT: A list of each meeting existing on Moodle and when its participants entered/left.

FIELD.NAME: participant_instance_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The user_id per Zoom API

FIELD.NAME: participant_universal_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The participant UUID per Zoom API.

FIELD.NAME: participant_email
FIELD.COMMENT: The particpant's email per Zoom API.

FIELD.NAME: meeting_webinar_instance_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The meeting UUID per Zoom API.

FIELD.NAME: join_time
FIELD.COMMENT: When the particpant joined the meeting.

FIELD.NAME: leave_time
FIELD.COMMENT: When the participant left the meeting.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: The time for which the participant was in the meeting.

FIELD.NAME: attentiveness_score
FIELD.COMMENT: How attentive the participant was during the meeting.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field exists only because Moodle requires us to have a unique 'id' field. Other than that it's useless.

KEY.NAME: id_primary
KEY.COMMENT: Moodle forces us to use id as a primary key. Most database actions will be performed using participant_universal_id.
